reviews.text: I had a memorable stay at Royale Regency Ochira. Staff were amazing and they go an extra mile to help and assist where possible. Akshay Prasad was truly a wonderful chap. Serves with not only a smile but was a great help when I needed help most. A superb staff deserves all the commendation. Royale Regency has committed and loyal staff who deserves nothing but praise.

I happened to stay at Royal Regency for two days recently and honestly speaking it was a great experience! The front office staff , room service staff and house keeping staff are all very dedicated and work towards making the guests comfortable . Kudos to their hospitality 👍👍 Special thanks to Sajis, Nithin and Anand for extending such a warm welcome and catering to the guests needs each time. You all have a great smile guys 😃😃😃

We stalyed there for one night. A couple and a kid. Reaching there is little task cuz of road work. Rooms are neat and clean but basic amenities like drinking water, Glass, spoon, paste etc...was not there. Restaurant had limited food options and highly priced too. They gave us the menu for dinner and told us there is limted option only. Didnt understand why they gave us the menu. Hot water is on solar so had to wait and call the support staff for help. It took almost 30 min to set it up.  Didnt find any other guest around loby or restaurant. Can make the service better.

The AC rooms were really good even if we asked for an extra bed it came around quickly . The room service was also really good and the rooms were really clean with the AC being in good condition and the beds doubled It was a really good experience . The amenities provided by them were also nice and we could connect to reception easily in case of anything. The Tv also had most of the channels subscribed. The wifi was also available only till the 3rd floor above that we could not connect to it .The only drawback would be the bathroom as it was not that clean . A good place to stay considering it's just on the side of the highway.

Located on the NH highway. Easily reachable one. Hotel has its own conventional centre celebrate the family function and etc. Also it has Bar facilities with restaurant. Cleanliness of the rooms are good.

places_with_reviews.name: Canalview Cottage
address: Azheekal Rd, Ayiramthengu, Karunagappalli, Azheekal, Kerala 690547, India

reviews.text:
The whole experience was good, the location and the related views are awesome. There's a canal in front of the cottage and you can have your morning/evening tea with such a beautiful and nature riched view. Good environment and customer friendly services. Even though the cuisines were not much expected.

Overall nice .....❤️

My husband and I stayed at Canal view cottage and Reghunath was truly a wonderful host. Really kind and helpful. He helped us with calling Renju’s auto for transport and food delivery from Saanz Bay seafood restaurant and serving us excellent traditional breakfast. Quiet safe family neighborhood and walkable distance to beach and 11 minutes to Amma ashram. Views: Lots of birds to watch in the area, red crabs and fish in the water and fishing boats floating by. We truly had a pleasant experience 🙏🏽

*Affordable Price(aprx 1800 for Ac rooms)
*Neat Rooms
*Nice front view
*Nearby Restaurants available
*friendly owner

We stayed here for a night..Food was great and Shaji and Raghunath was very courteous and helpful..and was flexible for any requests.. Has a good view of the canal with fishing boats plying every 5 minutes... Access is bit narrow for SUVs, else do recommend from all other aspects

This was undoubtedly the best day out experience. This cottage doesn't boast of it's great area but what makes it special is the location. The service rendered by Shaji the care taker was very nice. The staff is also very courteous. Food was the best I ever had deliverd from a sea side restaurant   A paradise for nature and legacy lovers, Coconut Lagoon, the alluring
backwater well maintained economy overall a great day out for my family

places_with_reviews.name: Lake Bay
address: Puthuppally, Near, Koottumvathukkal Bridge, Kayamkulam, Puthuppally, Kerala 690527, India

reviews.text:
The stay experience was amazing... Very neat and beautiful place to stay. The view outside is one of the most beautiful site to watch... The amenities here are very useful... I will for sure stay here again if i get a chance... Hoping they will keep up the place well maintained in the future...
The only reason i didn't give 5 star is you have to park your car on the road side in your own risk and from there we have to walk atleast 100 meters to reach the entrance which is not a pleasant way to walk. Didn't feel safe at all and not a neat path..
Other than that everything else is fine....
Very beutyful place and good atmosphere 🔥
Suitable for the couples and familys that like very private and beautiful experience with a very beautiful lake view

Really enjoyed the stay here. Beautiful ambience. The rooms were clean, very comfortable & the staffs are always warm & welcoming. Very friendly
management who make our stay enjoyable. Lake views are awesome.

A place where Nature, Art and emotions are blended in a perfect manner. An awesome place to hang out for couples ,friends &family . The place is gifted with serine lake view, soothing breezy atmosphere and breathtaking sunset. Hats off for the team for great conceptual  design nurturing the golden ages and the wonderful service with great foods. Keep it up,Will come again in my next holiday to kerala.

It's a good place to take a break, the beach is about a hundred feet away. Breakfast is provided.
The hospitality is warm and the host is interested in you.
The one aspect that leaves much to be desired is the water pressure when you take a bath.

A simple room. No luxuries. No cupboards. No hot water. Only one charging plug. Spartan but clean bathroom. No washbasin in the bathroom but in the common lobby. No TV and happy about that. Backup power is there. Clean towels. But with all these draw backs i rate the hospitality high. Ms.Hema the owner serves fantastic food. Breakfast is free. Other food is charged nominally. Beach is across the road. You will see and hear the roar of the sea from the balcony. MsHema will arrange transport for you to go around, but the local transport is not cheap. Will go back again.

Nice place to stay. I found exact place for my family. We were treated with good sea food. The sea was very close and I was hearing the sound of waves right through night. Wonderful experience sleeping close to the sea. Very homely stay. The people around were very cordial and affectionate.
Amazing homestay, right next to Azheekal beach. The view from balcony is simply superb. The house owner serves amazing breakfast. Neat and clean rooms with all facilities. Would recommend 10/10
Very nice room....just near the beach.  Very homely and safe for family.  Will never forget chechis putty, patit with pappadam for breakfast.  Thank you for accommodating us.🙏😀

places_with_reviews.name: HYMAM TOURIST HOME
address: opp. South Indian Bank, Oachira, Kerala 690526, India

reviews.text: Too BAD,No one should take a room here to sleep,There is a large gym on top .There is always the sound of the terrifying Dumbels falling and the deafening music.I am now getting headaches because I can't sleep through the night..
It was relay great stay for us.property is neat and clean. Adjustable room rent.
Good rooms, cleanliness room&bathroom, good parking place and near to city access.....
Good clean room. Good behaviour staff.

places_with_reviews.name: Homely meals vallikavu
address: Sugunananda Building, Amritapuri, Vallikavu, Kerala 690546, India

reviews.text:
Fish curry thali meals.

Served with 2 types of fish. Several vegetables, rice, sambar, buttermilk, and I enjoyed the lime pickle.

This is home style Kerala cooking. I was impressed with the food and appreciated  smiling owners.

I will definitely return.
The best food you can get in Vallikav🤤🤤🤤

Very personal and friendly place. Only 2 quite simple rooms available at the moment (nov 17) but they will extend the place with more rooms. The owner just changed recently and makes everything possible to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
Affordable price . Nn nice seafoods. ♥️ Natural view.. overall 3.9/5

Nice place
Beautiful  view to the backwater nice and fresh air and spicy and tasty food
Awesome food bt not so safe
Place with lots of peacefull vibes..

places_with_reviews.name: SPOT ON 81550 Sana Tourist Home
address: Bus Stop, 2A, Changankulangara Vallikunnam Road, Changankulangara, Kerala 690546, India
